content.raw:
+1 to support a resolution to this issue. I am currently struggling with Sawyer's wrist, shoulder and head joints in Gazebo simulation. They all have ranges beyond -pi or pi, or both in the case of J6. This prevents users from utilizing the full range of the robot while simulating their arm motion plans. It seems this is "built into" ODE to have a range of -pi to pi:
http://opende.sourceforge.net/docs/group__joints.html#ga23cbd4983ea2e1b80b404a277ab21120

Is there currently any workaround for larger joint limits?

Edit: for reference, here's the Sawyer Simulator repo: https://github.com/RethinkRobotics/sawyer_simulator
